H0.text: A backbone is not a feature that an invertebrate, such as a snail, possesses.

H1.text: Reproductive organs are what an invertebrate, such as a snail, does not have.

H2.text: Eyes are not present in an invertebrate, such as a snail.

H3.text: A heart is what an invertebrate, like a snail, does not have.

A4.text: Invertebrates are animals that neither develop nor retain a vertebral column.
